items.title: How to measure land area
items.content:
1. Open the app and navigate to Land Measurement
2. Allow GPS access
3. Walk around your plot boundaries
4. Mark each corner point
5. Complete the boundary to see the total area

items.title: Understanding acre calculations
items.content:
1 Acre = 43,560 square feet
1 Acre = 4,047 square meters
1 Acre = 100 cents
Use our built-in converter for accurate conversions

items.title: GPS boundary mapping guide
items.content:
Ensure clear sky view for better GPS accuracy
Maintain steady walking pace
Mark corners clearly
Double-check your starting and ending points

items.title: Area conversion tools usage
items.content:
Select your input unit
Enter the value
Choose desired output unit
Get instant conversion results

items.title: Crop monitoring basics
items.content:
1. Regular visual inspections
2. Document growth stages with photos
3. Monitor leaf color and health
4. Track plant height and density
5. Record watering and fertilization schedules

items.title: Soil health tracking
items.content:
pH Level: Maintain between 6.0-7.0
Nitrogen Content: Check monthly
Moisture Level: Monitor weekly
Organic Matter: Track seasonally
Soil Temperature: Record daily

items.title: Growth stage monitoring
items.content:
Seedling Stage: Days 1-15
Vegetative Stage: Days 16-30
Flowering Stage: Days 31-45
Fruiting Stage: Days 46-60
Harvesting Stage: Days 61-75

items.title: Field inspection tips
items.content:
Walk in zigzag pattern for thorough inspection
Check for pest infestations
Document unusual plant symptoms
Use our built-in pest identification tool
Create detailed inspection reports

items.title: Area calculation guide
items.content:
Square Plot: length × width
Rectangular Plot: length × width
Triangular Plot: ½ × base × height
Irregular Plot: Use GPS mapping
Circular Plot: π × radius²

items.title: Plot dimension tools
items.content:
1. Select plot shape
2. Enter measurements
3. Choose unit (feet/meters)
4. Get instant calculations
5. Save results for future reference

items.title: Cost estimation features
items.content:
Land value calculator
Development cost estimator
Property tax calculator
ROI prediction tool
Maintenance cost projector

items.title: Measurement unit conversion
items.content:
1 Hectare = 2.47 Acres
1 Acre = 43,560 sq ft
1 Square Meter = 10.764 sq ft
1 Cent = 435.6 sq ft
